relocate.translation[0].definitions[0].d: if a person or business relocates, or if they are relocated, they move to a different place
relocate.translation[0].definitions[0].e: A lot of firms are relocating to the North of England.
businesses that relocate in depressed areas
The residents were relocated to temporary accommodation while the work was being done.
relocate.translation[1].definitions[0].d: if a company or worker relocates or is relocated, they move to a different place
relocate.translation[1].definitions[0].e: Many workers are unwilling to relocate.
The company plans to relocate its corporate headquarters to Iowa.
